msTools

  • maintainLayout_manager
  • View page source

maintainLayout_manager¶

Functions¶

def isInstalled()

def install()

def uninstall()

Description¶

Manage installation of the Maintain Layout Manager within the current Maya session.

The Maintain Layout Manager maintains the layout of nodes in existing Node Editors when a connection is made. Designed specifically to handle connections between non-homogeneous data types which result in the creation of a unit conversion node.

The Maintain Layout Manager uses the value of the "MRS_NEExtensions_OptionVar_UCP" cmds.optionVar() to determine how new unit conversion nodes will be positioned.

msTools.tools.nodeEditorExtensions.maintainLayout_manager.isInstalled()¶
Returns:bool – True if the Maintain Layout Manager is installed, False otherwise.
msTools.tools.nodeEditorExtensions.maintainLayout_manager.install()¶

Install the Maintain Layout Manager if not already installed.

Note

A callable will be registered to the message event corresponding to OpenMaya.MDGMessage.addPreConnectionCallback(). A callback for this event will be installed by the msTools.tools.callback_manager if it does not yet exist.

msTools.tools.nodeEditorExtensions.maintainLayout_manager.uninstall()¶

Uninstall the Maintain Layout Manager if installed.

Note

A callable will be deregistered from the message event corresponding to OpenMaya.MDGMessage.addPreConnectionCallback(). The callback for this event will be uninstalled by the msTools.tools.callback_manager if no other callables are registered.
